mapper.select: select cate_id, cate_id as validate_id, cate_name, cate_img, cate_icon_img, parent_id, is_show, create_time, update_time, sort_num from weiit_init_product_cate where is_deleted = 0 and cate_id = #{validate_id}
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_init_product_cate (cate_name, cate_img, cate_icon_img, parent_id, is_show, create_time, update_time, sort_num, is_disabled, is_deleted) values (#{cate_name}, #{cate_img}, #{cate_icon_img}, #{parent_id}, #{is_show}, now(), now(), #{sort_num}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update weiit_init_product_cate set is_deleted= -1, update_time=now() where is_deleted = 0 and cate_id = #{validate_id}
